title: The Laughter of Strangers
description: 'SUGAR' WILLEM FLOURESThat's a name I built from the ground up. I wasn't the first to systematically climb the ranks, beating the sugar out of everyone I had known to be inferior, leaving only the sour taste of defeat, my claim forever being:"I am the greatest!"I can still hear it now. In the silence of this locker room, blood drying on my face, I can still hear those words.And I was. I was the greatest.JABLEFT HOOKJABLEFT HOOKRIGHT HOOKJABSTRAIGHTTO THE BODY:JABJABPOWER SHOT STRAIGHTPOWER SHOT STRAIGHTUPPERCUTAnd then a voice says, "'Sugar'... you are no longer sweet with the science."
author: Michael J. Seidlinger
